name: Super Star Platformer
description:
Super Star Platformer is a 2D side-scrolling platformer game where you progress by completing levels, collecting power ups and avoiding enemies along the way. The objective of the game is to reach the end of each level by avoiding obstacles and enemies!

Note from developer:

This game was completely generated using several AI, such as Dall-E 2 for the art, OpenAI's playground for the concepts, Soundraw for the music, GitHub's Copilot for the code, and many more! The game is short, but I hope you enjoy it nonetheless! There is a video linked describing the process and showing how it was all made!
